site.title: GS the best logistical chain of perishables
site.description: Here you can find our complete line of products for the logistical chain of perishables

product01.title: Thermal Curtain Divider
product01.description: The thermal curtain divider is a sound and heat insulator that reduces noise and heat generated by air passage.  Perfect for use in offices, meeting rooms, accommodations, and other spaces

product02.title: Bipartite Thermal Divider
product02.description: The bipartite thermal divider is a sound and heat insulator for two-room dividers.  Perfect for use in offices, meeting rooms, accommodations, and other spaces

product03.title: Thermal Cover for Palette
product03.description: The thermal cover for palette is a heat insulator that reduces heat loss from the palette.  Perfect for use in events, parties, food delivery, and other occasions
